author: xtqqczze
body:
The `RemoveAliasCommand` has an empty `HelpUri`.

`Remove-Alias` was added in #5143 so this issue exists since [v6.0.0](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v6.0.0).

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: @iSazonov Can you please reopen, in case we want to backport fix?

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #15622, which has now been successfully released as `v7.2.0-preview.8`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.0-preview.8)

title: Add missing `Remove-Alias` HelpUri
